Method Summary

 mixed format(array $event)

Method Detail

format

public mixed format(array $event)

This method formats the event for the firebug writer.

The default is to just send the message parameter, but through extension of this class and calling the {@see Zend_Log_Writer_Firebug::setFormatter()} method you can pass as much of the event data as you are interested in.

Description Copied From interface:

Formats data into a single line to be written by the writer.

Specified By

format in Zend_Log_Formatter_Interface
